page.title: 15TACOLNESTON VILLAGE HALL
page.content:
The inception of a village hall arose from a public meeting called by the W.I. & Ladies Friendship Club. 3.5 acres of land were purchased, most of which became a recreation area, & finally the hall was built in 1983.
{The cost was Â£45,000 of which Â£15,000 was from fundraising activities,& the remainder from grants from public funds.Although the hall was designed & built within a strict financial limit, it has proved to be adequate for most of the needs of the village.It is very well_used & financially sound.
The recreation area provides a cricket pitch,football pitch & a hard court for netball or tennis also a childrens play area. All these amenities are in full use.
